document.full_text: the peccadillo theater company's production of the 1951 musical 'a tree grows in brooklyn,' at the theater at st. clements, is a low-budget affair that wants to be high-budget.
document.title: theater review | 'a tree grows in brooklyn': melting-pot musical with one foot in comedy, one in tragedy
lines_and_colors: the peccadillo theater company's production of the 1951 musical 'a tree grows in brooklyn,' at the theater at st. clements, is a low-budget affair that wants to be high-budget.
